projects.name: Vue.js weather app
projects.description: In this project, my goal was to create a weather forecasting app using the OpenWeather API and present the data in an easy-to-use interface.

projects.name: Lokaler.lnu.no
projects.description: This project was introduced to me at a programming course with the creators, where they taught me the basic concepts of Ruby on Rails and how to create components. I was also shown how to send pull requests to the repository and work on my code based on their feedback. I am still listed as a contributor on this project, although I mostly just observe the website's development.

projects.name: Webshop
projects.description: I created this project as practice for building functional websites using the Flask library in Python to serve templates and data to the site. It started as a basic webshop template, but I expanded its functionality and essentially rewrote the code from scratch.

projects.name: Elevation-API
projects.description: This project aimed to be an app that could return the height of the ground (above sea level) at a given set of latitude and longitude coordinates. I spent most of the project figuring out how to retrieve this information, and I eventually discovered a black and white height map. I then focused on how to extract data from the map and into an array, which I was able to accomplish to some extent.
